items.text: back of a length around off, stands tall and punches past the left of the bowler
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Masakadza, no run

items.text: fuller around off, driven off the inside of the bat down the pitch as it comes on with the arm
items.shortText: Sunzamul Islam to Masakadza, no run

items.text: good length, spinning away outside off, defended
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, no run

items.text: reaches out to a fuller ball and drills it back off the inside of the bat
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, no run

items.text: fullish, sliding on middle and leg, pushed back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, no run

items.text: defended off the front foot back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, no run

items.text: tossed up and accurate on the stumps, defended
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, no run

items.text: full, curves in on the stumps, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full, curving in on middle, pushed down to long-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: fullish, more than a set of stumps outside off, leaves it as it holds its line
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, no run

items.text: slightly back of a length on off, stands tall and jabs it towards mid-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, no run
Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, no run

items.text: short and wide, slaps it hard through the point region. A nothing half-tracker
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, FOUR runs

items.text: short of good length on the stumps, gets on top of the bounce and keeps it out
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, no run

items.text: pushes forward to meet the pitch and the ball comes on with the arm to find the inside of the bat to fine leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball, pitching on middle and straightening, stays back to a delivery he should have been foreard to ad gets an outside edge that bounces in front of first slip
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, no run

items.text: full outside off, driven down to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: flat and full on off, defended
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Masakadza, no run
Shakib Al Hasan to Masakadza, 1 run

items.text: floats it up temptingly outside off and induces a wide drive through the covers
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: well away from the right-hander, left alone
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: full outside off, punched to long-on
items.postText: Rayhan: "Rather odd waking up and seeing a scorecard with a batsman out stumped having played 0 balls. Wonder how often that has happened"
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, no run

items.text: short of a length on middle, flicked into the midwicket region
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 2 runs

items.text: short of good length, angling into middle, pats it down to deep backward square leg for one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: short of a length outside off, punched firmly to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, no run
